names.pl: Piorunujący Wstrząs (Original Series) Szok Elektryczny (DP onwards)

Gold.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Silver.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Crystal.en: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Ruby.en: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

Sapphire.en: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

Emerald.en: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.

FireRed.en: An electric shock attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
FireRed.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner evtl. paralysiert.

LeafGreen.en: An electric shock attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
LeafGreen.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner evtl. paralysiert.

Diamond.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
Diamond.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner eventuell paralysiert.

Pearl.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
Pearl.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner eventuell paralysiert.

Platinum.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
Platinum.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner eventuell paralysiert.

HeartGold.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
HeartGold.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner eventuell paralysiert.

SoulSilver.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.
SoulSilver.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner eventuell paralysiert.

Black.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
Black.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

White.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
White.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

Black_2.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

White_2.en: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
White_2.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

X.en: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
X.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.

Y.en: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
Y.de: Eine Elektro-Attacke, die das Ziel eventuell paralysiert.
